taxon_name.authority: (Tuckerman ex Mackenzie) Mackenzie in N. L. Britton et al.

taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family cyperaceae;genus carex;section deweyanae;species deweyana;variety deweyana

bio:treatment.description: Longest inflorescences 35–56 mm; longest proximal internodes (11–)13–34 mm; longest proximal bracts 15–49 mm. 2n = 54.
Wet-mesic to dry-mesic forests, forest edges;

Alta., B.C., Man., N.B., Nfld. and Labr., N.W.T., N.S., Ont., P.E.I., Que., Sask., Yukon; Alaska, Colo., Conn., Ill., Iowa, Maine, Mass., Mich., Minn., Mont., N.H., N.J., N.Mex., N.Y., N.Dak., Ohio, Pa., S.Dak., Vt., Wash., Wis., Wyo.
